ModMetaData.name: Inspiration Tab
ModMetaData.author: Antigravity
ModMetaData.description:
Ever felt like your colonists just aren't inspired enough? Or maybe you desperately need that legendary armchair right now?
The Inspiration Tab mod is here to help! It adds a super simple tab that lets you grant any inspiration to any of your colonists instantly. No dev mode, no fuss, just pure inspiration at your fingertips. Go ahead, make their day!
